name: Skin Suede Melting Bronze Balm
about: What it is:A nourishing balm that can be used on face and eyes to add warmth..Coverage:Medium.Finish:Natural.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps and hydrates skin..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens and mineral oil. It is also vegan and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This is a multi-purpose, skin-perfecting, cream-to-powder balm that delivers natural warmth with hydration. Infused with delicate mattifying powders for a silky-soft finish, the air-light balm melts onto the skin and can be to bronze, sculpt, and create a monochromatic effect on eyes and lips.
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Visibly plumps and hydrates skin. .-Phytosqualane: Increase visible skin elasticity by supporting the lipid barrier. .-Cacao Seed Butter: Soothes and nourishes. ..Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, C8-12 Acid Triglyceride, Octyldodecanol, Helianthus Annuus Seed Wax (Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax), Silica, Synthetic Wax, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Zea Mays Starch, Ricinus Communis Seed Oil (Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil), Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil [+/-] May Contain Ci 77891 (Titanium Dioxide), Ci 77492 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77491 (Iron Oxides), Ci 77499 (Iron Oxides).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply all over face using fingertips or brush to add a natural touch of warmth, to sculpt and contour, or for a monochromatic effect on lips and eyes.

reviews.review_title: I wouldn’t recommend it for dry skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I m not quite sold on this product.  I m writing my experience on my super dry skin. This bronzer balm is cream to powder but it dries out too quickly and if you try to apply it again on top of the first layer starts to leave patches on the skin. I love the shade though! I wouldn’t recommend it for dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this bronze balm! it instantly went into my purse as an easy quick product that is nourishing and will give me a nice monochromatic look across my face and eyes. The best part of it was that it didn’t give me any texture and the tone was great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this cream bronzer! It’s so soft on the skin and colors just right! Recommend if you looking for something soft for everyday or if you like a full glam you can use as base and fix it with powder bronzer! Really happy with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving the Skin Suede Melting Bronze Balm! This cream to powder balm gives the face natural looking warmth along with a boost of hydration. Powered by Hydra Sphere Complex, this balm delivers a slow release hyaluronic acid to keep skin looking fresh and flawless. Delicate mattifying powders make sure the look stays set all day. For this look I used the balm on my cheeks and eyes. I was able to contour and sculpt my face in minutes. I love the monochromatic look I was able to achieve. I am wearing shade 03 Oak. This balm literally melts into the skin and is very buildable, ensuring a nourishing warmth every time. Can be applied with fingers, a brush, or a beauty sponge. Works well for both subtle daytime and more dramatic evening looks. Comes in a stackable compact that coordinates well with other products from the brand. Vegan, cruelty free, and sustainable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer blends beautifully on the skin you can build up to your own preference, I do have no acne and very little to no blemishes, my skin tone is light neutral with olive tones, describing that the undertone is warm on my skin tone. Regardless of that the formula is beautiful. Still my everyday bronzer for how easy it is to blend and build.

reviews.review_title: Such cute packaging and a good formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very interesting texture. It’s more like a colourpop super shock than the Mario bronzing balm. It’s more solid that I was anticipating but it’s still creamy and is easy to blend into the skin. I don’t think this would play well over powder. The second shade is a great warm bronzer that isn’t too orange. The formula is buildable. I have others I like a little more but this is a solid formula and really cute packaging.

I really like this bronzer it really makes my makeup pop and look beautiful! Definitely recommend this to anyone who wants to look snatched this fall this is a great bronzer and it will make you look flawless!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair
reviews.review_text: I am now obsessed with this bronzer! It’s the perfect shade of bronze for me and not too orange. I have never heard of the brand before but it’s a new fav of mine. Also I’m an obsessed with the packaging. It reminds me of a macaroon but make it mature and aesthetic. Definitely will be rebuying this bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED with this Skin Suede Melting Bronze Balm. I love the packaging it is easy to twist open and close . The texture is really nice it is like a cream clay formula. It blends really well and is extremely pigmented !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this bronzer melting balm. It’s so easy to use and applies on my skin so effortlessly without sticking to any dry patches. It’s perfect for sculpting my face. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Skin Suede Melting Bronze Balm is a standout product for achieving a radiant glow. Its silky texture glides on smoothly, blending effortlessly into the skin for a natural finish. The balm provides a buildable tint that enhances your complexion without looking cakey. Plus, it’s perfect for on-the-go application, making it a must-have for a quick sun-kissed look. Overall, it’s a luxurious addition to any makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is such an interesting formula and I am loving it right now! The formula is not too pigmented and blends into your skin so easily without looking orangey or “dirty”. I highly recommend using a dense brush for the bronzer as it a bit of a drier cream.
Quite possibly the worst bronzer/face product I have ever tried. The product is hard and completely unblendable. Do. Not. Purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bronzers are my favorite makeup product to try and I have been pleasantly surprised by this bronzer! It’s the one I reach for the most out of all my bother bronzers. It is very pigmented so you just need a couple of light taps into the pan on each cheek so this will last a while! Love it!

reviews.review_title: Use - if you want face fungus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The SKIN SUEDE Melting Bronze Balm is a luxurious addition to any beauty routine. Its smooth texture effortlessly glides onto the skin, leaving a radiant and natural-looking bronze finish. The balm's melting formula ensures easy application, and its subtle shimmer adds a touch of sophistication. The long-lasting effect provides a sun-kissed glow that enhances your complexion. While the price point may be higher, the quality justifies the investment for those seeking a high-end bronzing experience. Overall, the Melting Bronze Balm is a standout product for achieving a luminous and dewy complexion.

reviews.review_title: Easy to apply, cedar great shade

I personally found this wasn’t necessary and application was super easy just swiping my fingers on top and dabbing onto my skin. It’s not greasy and it stays put all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: From the moment this bronzer touched my skin, I was amazed by how incredibly smooth and weightless it feels. What's even more impressive is that this balm isn't just about aesthetics; it's good for your skin. Packed with nourishing ingredients, it not only enhances your complexion but also helps to hydrate and protect your skin, leaving it looking radiant and healthy. I've tried many bronzing products, but this one stands out for its versatility and the natural, radiant finish it imparts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed! Bronzing/contouring has always intimidated me. This makes it so easy to bronze and contour even if you’re a total newbie, like me. It is a super blendable, creamy formula. I started off with a super light look and have been experimenting every day with it. You could also use this as a cream shadow or even to add color to your lips. I love how easy this is to use and how multifunctional it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

I love bronzy looks and I was able to wear it on my cheeks, eyes and lips. The formula is very creamy & blends so easily. The packaging is cool too! You are able to stack them so I do want to try out more products from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: So beautiful you need to get it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loving this multi-purpose balm! It has a perfect silky- soft finish.  Plus, it's so versatile – I use it to bronze, sculpt, and even on my eyes and lips for a monochromatic look. It’s nourishing and hydrating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely impressed with the innovation behind SIMIHAZE BEAUTY's STACKABLES - SKIN SUEDE Melting Bronze Balm! This product is a game-changer in the makeup world, thanks to the creative minds of Simi and Haze.  What sets this balm apart is its unique engineering system that allows for durable portability and daily customization. It's a versatile product that can even out your complexion, perfect skin texture, and keep your skin moisture-rich and smooth. I love that it's designed for day-to-night use and is perfect for those on-the-go moments.  The founders' idea of creating an alternative to contour with a nourishing balm is brilliant. It not only adds warmth to your face but also sculpts and blurs, providing a natural, sun-kissed glow. The fact that it comes in 6 shades for perfecting, sculpting, bronzing, and contouring is a big plus.  Applying the SKIN SUEDE Melting Bronze Balm is a breeze – you can use your fingertips or a brush to achieve a natural touch of warmth, sculpting, contouring, or even a monochromatic effect on lips and eyes.  What truly impresses me is the formulation. It's infused with delicate mattifying powders for a silky-soft finish, and the balm melts seamlessly onto the skin. The slow-release Hydra-Sphere Complex with small molecular weight hyaluronic acid is a fantastic addition, as it not only plumps but also hydrates the skin from the inside out.  Overall, SIMIHAZE BEAUTY has delivered a truly innovative and versatile product with SKIN SUEDE Melting Bronze Balm. It's a must-have for anyone looking to enhance their natural beauty and create different looks effortlessly. Kudos to Simi and Haze for this fantastic creation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the creamy formula to powder this bronzing balm has, it wasn’t the easiest to blend but I really enjoyed using it on my eyelids to give a more bronze look in an otherwise natural makeup look I had.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Balmy more than cream. Cedar is warm not orange !
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This felt balmy more than creamy. Though the formulation says cream, the description says balm. That being said I find balms to be a little patchier as they wear. This blended out nicely  but I feel like as the day went on it moved/faded a bit (balmy textures aren’t as compatible with my skin type). It did turn from balm to powder,  but I felt like it faded a bit and felt semi greasy at first. Usually with cream formulations they feel thicker and somewhat dryer Than a balm. I liked the color and I do think that had my skin type been compatible this would be a good product, so that’s why I will rate it a 4! Cedar does give a warm golden glow, not too orange.  good shade choice for light skin neutral undertones.

reviews.review_text: Great bronzer for any kind of skin color.  The packing its perfect to carry it on the go.  It can also be a buildable bronzer depending on your preference. I use the bronzer every day and am very pleased.

reviews.review_text: This bronzing balm is so nice and easy to blend. I love using this with liquid or cream foundations. It blends seamlessly into my skin and it doesn’t leave any harsh contour or bronzing lines! I’m so excited to try more products from this brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really easy to blend with your fingers which I like for a natural look.  I have the shade cedar which is warm tone. I would probably pick up sycamore as a light neutral but this shade still worked well for me. I have been using on my eyes as well which is an easy one and done look. Overall nice to have as a cream contour or bronzer and a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been reaching for more cream products as the colder weather arrives and I love how this applies. The color is perfect and I love using my fingers for these kinds of products as someone said makeup should be applied like your skin care

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great everyday bronzer. Very easy to use, blends easy but still gives you a good amount of color. Very user friendly. If you’re a beginner at makeup this would be a great bronzer to start off with .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so confused upon receiving this - I couldn't figure out how to open it! haha you just gotta twist it. I think it's a beautiful product nonetheless. The creamyness is subtle and is stiffer than usual - which I think I prefer so you have to intentionally build it up. The warmth is nice on my medium skin. It's a refreshing product to have on the table - just don't forget to close it back up.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is absolutely. First of all the packaging is great for travel and on the go. It is the perfect size to slide in a purse as well! It is easy application and very blendable. It gives the perfect bronzed look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is somewhat interesting, I’m not sure if I would gravitate towards this bronzer/contour palate in the future or not. It what somewhat hard to blend and the creaminess felt off. Maybe I’m just not used to it. I received something in exchange for this post

Pleasantly surprised. I think this was going to be way too warm and super dry, but it actually blends out ok to a matte-ish finish. I like it. The packaging is kind of an awkward shape & size and is annoying to screw on and off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm genuinely impressed with this balm. It effortlessly blends to give my skin a velvety smooth finish. What's even better is its versatility – you can use it as a bronzer, on your eyes, or even on your lips. Personally, I prefer using it as a bronzer or eyeshadow. It's not only long-lasting but also keeps my skin well-hydrated. The compact packaging with the twist-off lid is super convenient, making it a perfect on-the-go option. This balm has definitely earned its place in my makeup collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn’t really know what to make of the product when I first opened the package. But I was extremely pleasantly surprised when applying it! I just lightly tapped my brush in and blended without issue, and mahogany is the perfect shade to contour! In the hollows of my cheeks it gave the perfect shadow.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this skin melting bronzer balm! It blends good with a brush or your fingers, use your finger for a more natural look since the warmth of your fingers will warm it up! Super pigmented and a great color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a very good find at Sephora! I love the packaging and Think it’s very unique. The formula is super creamy and very blendable I would recommend this to anyone looking for a new go to natural bronzer for Dewey and matte looks.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary gift by SIMIHAZE. I truly fell in love with the Skin Suede  Melting Bronze Balm. It gave me the perfect contour. What I love the most about this product is the perfect sculpting it gives you. Further, I really like how you can use this product around your eyes, lips and cheeks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer creates the most gorgeous glow on your skin. I apply it to my check bones and on my eyelids to create a natural glow and it looks so beautiful and stunning. the formula is perfect I will never stop using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying Simihaze Beauty and I was super impressed. I got the color maple 05 and I have medium tone skin and fit me perfect. The packaging is amazing and aesthetically pleasing. Overall I loved it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good! It’s a cushion based products so the brush easily picks it up and it’s so buildable and blendable. I love how beginners friendly this is. I don’t know how to bronze but this makes it really easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried the skin suede and I am pleasantly surprised. The package was super chic and loved everything about it. The product itself was really good as well. It was very pigmented and easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This multi-purpose sculpting skin bronze balm has been a really nice addition into my contouring routine. It doesn't leave behind any muddiness and blends beautiful above other cream or powder products.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is very different in a good way! It has a sponge look to the texture but builds beautifully. It’s not super pigmented so it’s nice if you like a buildable bronzer. I thought it would be orange on me but it wasn’t it was a nice warm color on my fair complexion. It’s a great bronzer to check out!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was so unique and different i loved it! The packaging was so cool i’ve never seen anything like it. The product itself was also great for my contour and it looked amazing and very sculpted. It made my skin feel so silky and natural

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is super silky and beautiful! It blends like a dream but you can also build it up nicely on the skin. I also love the shade cedar 02 it works really nicely with my golden undertone! Great bronzer.

This bronze balm is so compact and easy to carry around, and it’s not powder so it won’t shatter. I love how easy it is to blend and it really gives me such a sun kisses look! It lasts all day and is very buildable

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is such a perfect medium color for my warm skintone. It’s so cute and easy to use as well. I love how compact it is. The texture is kinda bouncy. It’s easy to apply and blends in so well. It’s a great one for daily use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product but am obsessed with this! i use it with the underpainting technique and my makeup looks so glowy and natural. I like to use my fingers to apply and then use my brush to go over it and blend perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love to use my cream bronzers as eyeshadow and this was the perfect shade to to use for both. It was also super creamy and blended out super easily with a brush, definitely going to implement this into my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is awesome and amazing. It melt so nicely on the skin and it easily blends. So easy to use. Love the shade. It is so hydrating. Has a natural matte finish. Looks so natural. Great product to travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really enjoying the formula of this! It's creamy and it blends smoothly into the skin without tugging the makeup underneath. The shade I have is warmer than I like but it blends out so nicely I make it work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a multi purpose product that you can use on your daily basis or to create a more glamorous look. I like how compact it is and it’s travel friendly the texture is easy to blend and you can use the fingers to apply as well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is definitely buildable. I like how it’s not an ashy contour, but it does add more warmth to my skin when I have foundation on. I think it’s easier to use your fingers rather than a brush because it doesn’t apply well to a brush.

reviews.review_title: Takes practice but end result looks good!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was honestly quite difficult for me to work with. I used both a beauty blender and a brush to apply, I found that I like applying it with the brush first for precision, then blending with the sponge. The concept of the product is really cool and the contour shade worked well with my skin tone. It’s definitely a product that will take a little practice to get used to but the end result looks good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super cute and convenient packaging. Unfortunately didn’t find it blended it as well as I had hoped. It is however pretty pigmented for a cream bronzer but wished it melted into the skin better. This product was gifted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am forever hunting for the perfect bronzer for my pale, pink toned face. So many show up either gray or muddy, but I think SKIN SUEDE Melting Bronze Balm in Sycamore may have nailed it! I can use it over sunscreen and a touch of concealer as bronzer, contour, eyeshadow- even a touch on my lips for color! The powder blends in seamlessly for a simple natural glow that takes minutes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying anything from this amazing brand. But this balm really helps keep my skin hydrated without looking thick and heavy and helps keep the glow. I truly recommend this for anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very unique bronzing tool. I like how easy it was to apply to my face and it blended quite nicely. I have fair skin and the bronzer gave me a light glow that I enjoyed, especially for the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is such a lovely formula,  it melts onto skin effortlessly. I love applying this on my eyes too! It blends out seamlessly into skin without looking streaky and it lasts all day without budging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is something amazing, this product is really blending nicely on to my skin, I love the texture of this product. The packaging looks so cute. I love the fact that it’s melting in to my skin nicely, and giving me desired contour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I am obsessed with this cream bronzer. I have tan skin and selected the shade Maple. The undertone of this product is so perfect. It gave me the perfect tone for sculpting, not going to lie I haven’t put down this product since I received it. I love the texture, it feels like a balm but sets like a powder. You don’t need to set it with powder! That’s my second favorite thing about this cream bronzer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Skin Suede bronzing balm. It blends well and if you pick the right shade it's so beautiful. The only thing that I don't like is how hard it is to take the lid off. I've turned it so many times and couldn't get it opened for a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is a creamy and buildable bronzer. I like how easy it blends as well. I got it in shade sycamore which is lighter for me but since it is buildable, i am still able to use it as a bronzer. I have also tried it on my eyes and lips. I liked it on my eyes for a monochromatic look but it wasn’t it for me on the lips. Overall though i really like the formulation and the packaging. I wish the cap had a small mirror in it though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried Simihaze Beauty’s new Melting Bronze Balm, this product is silky smooth and glides through my skin like butter. The product is well pigmented  and builds up really nice with my other products. This my new go to bronzer, it has the right amount of warmth to skin tone, I recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Packaging: Minimalist yet aesthetically pleasing Can be stacked! Opening: Twist too Texture: Balm/Cream Texture Longevity: Worn on a full day from 8am until 12pm. Holds on amazingly with other cream products. Subtle sculpt look.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I finally tried the SimiHaze skin suede melting bronzer balm and I am obsessed. This is such a great product, i also love that it is multi use! I love using this as an eyeshadow as well as a bronzer! Love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a unique product. The texture is like nothing I’ve ever felt ,it’s like a cream-like balm formula. This bronzer goes on so easy and blends into the skin flawlessly. This bronzer also has a lot of pigment, but still looks so natural on the skin. I really love the packaging as well. It’s super fun. This is definitely one of my new favorite bronzers and I can use it with just my fingers, a brush or a sponge. This bronzer has a hydrating balm texture that make the skin look like it’s glowing from within. I also really like this product for shaping my face. I’ll be honest I’m not a huge fan of the shade on my lips, but it did feel super comfortable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! When I got it, you could tell that the packaging is definitely a stackable with the other products. There’s in dense, so it perfectly stacks. As for the formula, it is definitely creamy, but not too creamy. Definitely a lot of product in the packaging and it goes on. So smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzing balm is honestly amazing. I’ve never tried anything so pigmented and smooth like this product. I really enjoying using this product to sculpt my cheekbones and I sometimes also use it as eyeshadow too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends flawlessly into my skin. I use it on my eyes and face. Lasts all day and does not settle into the creases of my skin.

reviews.review_title: Small But Packs A Major Punch!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Simihaze is a new clean brand and I love that I got to try their new stackable melting bronze balm. I used the shade maple which is the perfect shade that is in the middle of warm and golden. Maple shows up on my eyelids as a nice matte eyeshadow which is just a simple one shadow look. The packing is thin and perfect to toss in purse for touch ups and especially for travel. I will definitely be checking out other products from this brand.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone
reviews.review_text: The packaging of this product is really interesting but what I really like about it is that it is not too thin to where it looks muddy when you're blending it out but it's not too thick either to where you're wondering if you're going to get the benefit of using a cream product. I plan on using this in winter when my skin is dry. It blends nicely.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So many things to love about this product!! To start, I love the packaging, compact and fun, unique, something I haven't seen before. The bronzing balm itself is beautifully, it has a balm texture that is slightly creamy, that blends beautifully on the skin, stunning shade. So impressed with the brand for my first experience!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product do much its so beautifully tinted and absolutely i love it the shade is so beautiful on my skin and i luv the look of it on my skin without any makeup on and just with a bit of blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this broner from SimiHaze for my honest review. I think this bronzer is great! It looks good on the skin. I like how its vegan, cruelty free, paraben free, and sustainable. I'd recommend.

reviews.review_title: A quick and beautiful bronzed look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a bronze balm at home. I got SIMIHAZEBEAUTY in the Terracotta Skin Suede shade. It was tightly sealed with a pop up/off twist top. It had a pleasant neutral scent that reminded me of terracotta! The color was rich and smooth to the touch. It was super easy to apply and within minutes I had a bronzed look. I am super happy with that and want to try other shades on my skin color to see the effect. This is a quick apply color that can be used all year round whenever you want to add some quick yet vibrant and beautiful color highlights to your skin to give it a bronze glow look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product. This product is great. If you don’t like heavy bronzer, it is great for someone who has dry skin like me because the formula is super creamy. I will purchase this again in the future.

This new product by Simon haze the skin suede melting bronze balm. It’s a great product because it’s so versatile. You can use it on your eyes and cheeks. I think it’s great that it’s cream to powder which makes blending out so easy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty! I won’t lie it took me a good 6 minutes to figure out how to open this haha! But then I used my fingers and warmed it up a little and put it on my cheeks. Very pretty and natural bronzer! Super happy with this product.

reviews.review_title: Love the cream to powder formula!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First look I thought the balm looks dark on the container. But once i swiped it, Oak was actually the right shade for my light-med skin tone. Not muddy or too warm. Fascinating balm/cream formula that transforms into powder once blended. Love how natural it looked on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first time trying a bronze balm and Im happy to now add this to my makeup collection. The texture was very smooth. So that it wasnt messy during application, I used my usual contour brush. It was perfect to use for light contouring.

reviews.review_title: Very greasy formula, would not recommend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product made my face so greasy after applying and it’s not pigmented at all. The shade range also needs a lot of work, the undertones are not flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m new to this brand but so far I’m pleased! I really like this bronzer because the deeper shade is perfect for my medium skintone and doesn’t look muddy on me. I like the cute packaging too. The formula is very easy to apply and blends out into a balmy/sheer look. It has a natural finish too which I like to build up. I hope to try more for this brand soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product and it blends so well! I received the mahogany shade because I accidentally placed an order for the wrong shade. It’s too dark for me because I have fair skin, so I used it as an eyeshadow and I highly recommend! It blended out so well and is very pigmented. The packaging is also very cute and unique.

reviews.review_title: this bronzer is very natural and is best for light
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this bronzer is very natural and is best for light makeup days. The shade I choose was a bit off for me but that’s my fault! the formula is very interesting and look forward to play with it a bit more and maybe use it as eyeshadow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Skin Suede melting balm is the perfect bronzer that leaves a natural barely there sunkissed finish. It is easily blendable and super easy to use. I like the creamy formula and the minimal packaging too.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such an interesting formula of bronzer. I find it to be pretty sheer and natural looking, which I like. It blends out easily and looks airbrushed on the skin. It’s very matte and transforms to a powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how seamless this blends in. The color is really nice for a natural every day look. I love that I can use it all over my face for a really pretty bronzed look. The package is very cool and chic too.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a cool bronzer! The packaging is really neat and feels compact but sturdy. It gives a cool natural vibe even though it seems to be made of plastic. I really love the formula of the bronzer. It’s really soft and blends super easily. I also love the shade that I got! I was worried it would be too dark but it blends out perfectly and gives a cool shadow. My new fav!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_text: Love this contour! It’s so crème and soft and blends so well! A little goes a long way and it provides a nice finishing look! I’ve been really enjoying using lately! Would definitely recommend I love !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very buildable, feels extremely soft and the packaging is nice. Once I purchase more stackables, I can't wait to stack them! It blended well and can even be used as shadow or liner. I received something in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wasn’t expecting such a high quality formula. I thought it was going to be too slippery, sheer, balmy, not show up, but it’s a nice texture and pigmentation is there. You can build it up if you want but I find with just a couple of taps (with a brush) the color is great and I need no building! I hate the packaging, I wish it wasn’t so fickle to open and close. It’s a twist off style component and I struggled A LOT the first time I opened it. So if you can see past a slim, thin, hard to grab, type of lid, try it. The formula inside really is super high quality!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am a little scared of bronzer as I don't use it much . I love that this is easy to use and melts quickly and right into the skin .  I love the color it's just enough bronze but not so much that I'm scared to get it blended :

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great product. I was really surprised when I tried it and saw that it’s a bouncy texture and more of a liquid to powder finish. I think this is going to work perfect for me as a contour shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the packaging and that their products are stackable. The bronzer has a thicker creamy formula, but a little goes a long a way. It’s pigmented and easy to blend. Due to its balmy formula it gives a natural glow to the skin. I absolutely love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first make up product from this brand, and I am so excited for the bronzer. It has a cushion style compact, which will make it very easy to apply. Bronzer‘s are a part of my every day make up look so I will begin incorporating it now! Run and pick one up for yourself!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this product as it has multiple uses, could be used as bronzer, shadow,liner. Feels so soft on the skin, the pigment is very buildable from soft to dark as desired. Packaging is so sleek, with a modern twist.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer balm is a great bronzer. This was my first time trying this brand and I really enjoyed using their product. This bronzer melted into my skin giving me a natural bronzed look. Really enjoyed using it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the transparent color this gives my face, it makes me look like I have a slight tan. It’s also very soft and smooths my skin out. The stackable part is really nice too, can’t wait to purchase more shades. I received something in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a fair skinned girly, I love for a good bronzer glow & have tried an absolute ton of them. This new one from Simihaze has one of the best textures and finish out there. I tried the shade “Oak” and while I would not use it for contour because of the peachy warmth it has, it has the perfect shade for a glowy bronze or an all over monochromatic moment. The quality is exceptional, it glides and melts into the skin beautifully, you can tell it was made in Italy. The only part I found unremarkable was the packaging, im over the stacked gimmick. Product formulation and performance tones than makes up for the lackluster packaging.

reviews.review_title: So buttery and easy to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this bronzer, it is very creamy and blendable. I have medium neutral complexion and the shade oak 03 was the perfect match for me in order to look sun-kissed and natural. If you are looking for a more glam look I would say go a shade deeper but nonetheless this formula is so buttery and easy to work with. Also the packaging is so pretty and out of the normal, I’m so pleasantly glad to have it!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love that this can be used with multi purpose. It definitely was my favorite to apply as an eyeshadow. I didn’t even put primer on and it wore all day. As a bronzer I would say it is best to apply it on when you use a moisturizer. My friend tried using it even though she didn’t moisturize her skin and it looked a little patchy. But with prepped skin this looks amazing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved using this bronzer! It’s the multi-purpose perfecting cream-to-powder bronze balm I’ve been on the hunt for! It sculpts my face perfectly, as well as a nice contour on my cheeks. My skin looks flawless as a result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This melting bronzer bomb is so good and super pigmented. I only recommend a pea size amount for each section that you want to bronze and it is so easy to blend. I cannot get over how creamy the formula is.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this!! It blends flawlessly! I am actually ordering a darker shade because I self tan and so there is times I am a little darker. I loved how beautiful it looks on my skin! I also love the price point because it is not expensive and a little goes a long way. Definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This skin suede melting bronzer is too good! I love that it is a cream application but finishes as a powder so you get that perfect blend. I got cedar which is a beautiful warm and golden shade. It looks amazing on the skin and is quite literally like a second skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is travel friendly and so easy to use. I love the overall compact packaging which makes it more easy to carry it all along. I totally love using this anytime to quick touch base natural makeup look. Totally the best bronze balm that lasts longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this bronzer. It has a creamy, almost pomade-like consistency. It goes on smoothly and blends easily. It is not matte but also not dewy. It has a natural, skin-like finish. I like this bronzer and I would recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like this bronzer because of how it goes from cream to powder. It blends out so easily and is perfect for bronzer, contour, and every eyeshadow. I like that the packaging can be stacked with other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very hydrating bronze balm and with a cream formula, I find that it keeps my skin from drying out. I love the hyaluronic acid and cacao seed butter ingredients because I feel like they add a glowy touch

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who likes light makeup days, this is perfect for everyday wear! I love applying this bronzer balm on my cheeks and eyes. Also I highly recommend for dry skin types if you’re looking for a product that doesn’t leave dry patches!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First time using this brand! The packaging is so cute and it’s stackable. The color is very pigmented but blends very easy. I use this to sculpt my face and it works great even with my dry skin. I got a color too dark, but it still works as a good contour for my skin color when I use a little and blend it in.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color and the pigment! It was difficult to open the product, but that’s mainly user error 😂 I really loved the smooth application and longevity of the product. Definitely recommend. I love the monochromatic look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this bronze balm in exchange for my honest opinion but I really love this skin suede melting bronze balm - it’s such an awesome texture and the color is perfect for my skin tone as well as I love the way my makeup looks when adding to complete my makeup routine. I really have found this to be a great addition to add for contouring purposes or as a base depending on what you are going for with your makeup!

reviews.review_title: Easy to blend and super lightweight!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am actually pleasantly surprised by this product! I wasn’t sure if I got the right shade but it’s absolutely beautiful. It’s really light when applied on your face and blends in very well! I recommend using your fingers if it’s for an eyeshadow and a beauty blender if you’re using for contour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product that I tried from this brand and let me say what a pleasant surprise. The packaging is so cute. It’s so compact. The texture of the product is really interesting and it’s not too soft. I found that it was very very buildable, rather than super pigmented right out the gate, which I prefer in a bronzer, my favorite part was how buildable it was I could have a very very light bronze or I could build it up to be a lot deeper. Another thing that I loved about this product is that it works with so many other products I use a liquid foundation and I had a loose powder setting powder. I had a powder blush cream highlighter, and it worked well with all of my other products, in my experience a lot of Puddy products don’t tend to work with other products very well so I cannot recommend this enough. The price is right the quality is right the packaging is right. I love everything about this product and I cannot wait to try more from the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This isn’t a product I would typically go for but I was pleasantly surprised. I’m honestly surprised these aren’t more talked about, these melt into your skin and leave a really beautiful wash of color whole blurring and bronzing. This has easily become an everyday product for me since it’s so user friendly and beautiful. The packaging is also very sleek and compact which I really like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t used a bronzer balm in a really long time so I was really excited to try this new one! It blends into my skin and makeup really nicely and gives me a nice bronze look I highly recommend using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product effortlessly blends into my skin, leaving a natural, sun-kissed glow that's perfect for any season. The texture is incredibly smooth, making application a breeze, and it doesn't feel heavy or greasy. Plus, it's versatile – I've used it as both a bronzer and an eyeshadow, achieving a radiant look every time. Highly recommended for those looking to add a touch of warmth and luminosity to their makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This skin suede melting bronze balm was not the right fit for me. It’s only 02 shade but it was too orange for me. Therefore there are some aspects I can’t rate. As for the blendability it blends superbly and the formula feels smooth and nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg I am obsessed with this melting bronze balm. The color is stunning and the texture is perfect. Literally melts on my skin and looks amazing. I love using it as a bronzer or eye shadow on my eyes!!

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous, buildable color and love the texture
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a big fan of anything multi-use; I've been loving ILIA's multi stick lately but wanted something with more of a brown tone for the autumn. I absolutely LOVE the SIMIHAZE bronze balm in Oak. It has such an interesting texture, not quite as creamy as NARS, but definitely not a powder. It blends beautifully and has perfectly buildable color that works for all areas of my face. It's quite a small container, but I'm hoping it lasts since a little seems to go a long way. I'd combine this with another shade of the same product for a multidimensional look, but it's lovely on its own. Definitely going to be a regular in my rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the formula for this product! The shade I received was too red/warm for me but I definitely think the formula and look is really nice and the packaging is very aesthetically pleasing. Overall rate it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a highly pigmented product so be ready to blend! I followed the directions and warmed it with my fingers and applied to my face as contour. I then used a cream bronzer brush to blend it in and it blended well. It didn’t cause any pilling which I was excited about. Gifted by Simihaze

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg Im in loveee! This is the first item I’ve tried from this brand and it’s so nice! It blended out nicely, wasn’t muddy looking, and the texture is so interesting. The packaging is interesting too. It took me a moment to figure out how to open it lol.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer is like nothing I’ve ever used! The consistency seemed spongey at first , but it was surprisingly solid. The product itself gives off a natural bronzed look, with the cream bronzer providing light - medium coverage. The shade I got has a beautiful warm undertone that isn’t too RED which I appreciate having darker skin. It blended in well with my foundation and other products . Overall, I love !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Skin Suede Melting Bronze Balm is spectacular, and a really great multitasker especially if you love that clean girl, I woke up this way look. The formula is so interesting. I love the way that it blends in to the skin looking natural but at the same time giving me this beautiful glow and sculpting. I also really love the minimal packaging, which makes it super easy to take on the go, I can see this being one of my new must haves on my vanity.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i was so excited to try this product and ended up really liking it! the packaging is super cute but i couldn’t figure out how to open it at first lol. u can use it on ur eyes lips and cheeks which is something i love as well! it melts right into your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the bronzer, it is a pleasant shade and has a comfortable, creamy texture. The pigmentation is very good. The staying power of the product is also excellent. I love this bronzer. IT’s gift by Brand

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Stackables Melting Bronze Balm in Skin Suede is a makeup game-changer. Its velvety texture makes for easy application, and the Skin Suede shade offers a perfect balance of warmth and shimmer. The pigmentation is impressive, and it lasts all day, even in humid weather. What sets it apart is its versatility – it can be used as a bronzer, eyeshadow, or highlighter. Plus, the sleek, compact packaging with a mirror is a bonus for on-the-go touch-ups. It's a must-have in any makeup collection, suitable for both makeup beginners and enthusiasts.

I love to use bronzer to sculpt my face and this one is amazing! The color is pigmented and stays all day. I love the packaging and that it is stackable. It is also very chic. The formula is smooth and high quality

reviews.review_title: Perfect easy to blend muti-use makeup
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This bronze balm created the perfect sculpted contour and monochromatic eye effect! I am so grateful I got to tried this to see if I’d have any skin sensitivity. So far so good even for someone pale like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this multipurpose bronzer. I found it very easy to sculpt the face, bronzer my overall face as well as use as eyeshadow.   I picked up the shade “05 Maple” and it’s a perfect shade for Medium/Tan olive skin tones. I definitely want to pickup the other shades in this melting bronzer for my professional makeup artistry kit - that’s how much I liked this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediately fell in love with this product! Used on my cheeks, eyes & lips for a monochromatic look - GURL my face looked extra put together, a soft but blended look. I think I could definitely get a more rosey shade & it would look more fresh like shower clean, if that makes sense - the maple looks very “fall” & I am here for it. I got compliments all day about how snatched my face looked I was not mad. Buttery soft & easy to blend.  & they’re stackable so I’m definitely getting all the shades. I’m obviously very excited about these lol (gifted in exchange for honest review)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very unique and cool looking bronzer. Works well on my dry skin with and without foundation, but when I want to have some extra countering on my face. Amazing design of the bronzer and love how little it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never try Simihaze before and this bronze balm in the color Maple blew me away. The packaging is so aesthetically pretty and picturesque. And this bronze balm can be used in different way like in your eyes, lips and checks. I love how creamy and beautiful looks on my skin and look monochrome and put up together without using so many products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this product but unfortunately was sent a shade that isn’t compatible with my skin tone. I’m quite fair and received the shade Mahogany. It’s nice on the eyes and lips but just too dark to use anywhere else. I also feel like it emphasized any dry spots on my lips. Definitely exfoliate your lips first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty tone and blends well into my skin. I can wear it on the eyes, lips, and cheeks as a monochromatic look. Versatile bronzer that sculpts my face and looks perfectly natural for day or night. Final look is a healthy, neutral glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this bronzer. It blends into the skin, so effortlessly, almost like it melts. It gives you such a sharp contoured look on the cheek, bones, Jeong, and forehead. It’s my new go to bronzer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product! Such a very beautiful shade for fair skin tones (the lightest) super blend able and buttery. I’m so glad I discovered this brand and I can’t wait to try my products from them!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice bronzer and I absolutely love the compact, stackable packaging. It blends nicely in my opinion (I always use a brush) and also builds up good without looking patchy. I like how I can just wear a little bit for a natural look or really build it up to do a stronger contour. It also works great as an eyeshadow and to line the lips for a monochromatic look. I recommend it especially for traveling for how compact it is!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Usually my go to is powder bronzers but I was pleasantly surprised! It blends well on my cheeks and on my eye lids for a glowy and bronze latte makeup look! Its also buildable so I can make it look more subtle or more for contouring!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t tried anything from SIMIHAZE before but this definitely was the perfect product to start with! It is amazing product to contour and shape and color my face with ! It gave my face this beautiful bronze look !

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is so alien like jar! I was intrigued as soon as I opened it. Love love the packaging. Texture of the product was also cool. Velvety soft, pleasant texture and so easy to apply. This is apply with fingers kinda of product. So perfect for when on the go or traveling. Very trendy and fun!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is like an instant summer glow in a compact- which is perfect for keeping a glowy look in the fall! The balm sculpts and hydrates, giving my skin a natural warmth. I love that it's vegan, cruelty-free! so excited to try out other products from the brand 🤎

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the skin suede melting bronze balm, melts right into your skin and blends like a dream. I used it on my eyes, lips and as contour I do like its buildable but little goes a long way. You can use your fingers or a brush to blend. This definitely be my go to bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, the Melting Bronze Balm is another flop for me from Simihaze. I have the shade Cedar, which is far more saturated and orange than the swatches online - so I would try to go in store if you're interested in this one. While the Melting Bronze Balm is a beautiful texture and can be sheered out or built up slightly, I prefer the formula/wear time/overall look of most other cream bronzers in my collection. My other gripe is the price, which is steep for the very small amount of product (particularly when compared to other popular options) and the packaging is not anything special either. Overall, it's not the worst but I wouldn't recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is a little patchy but I use it as contour and it works well. Using a sponge versus a make up brush helps a lot. If you take a little time to blend it, it actually looks quite nice. Not the smoothest but it is pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this bronze balm it’s so amazing ! I used this for contour and it melted into my skin so easily! It look so natural and glowy! I love how it’s multi use and can use it on your eyes and lips! I love the shade too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love a good bronzer that works well. Been enjoying this bronzer a lot. It melt so easy and blends perfectly on the skin love that it dries out fast and give beautiful define look to my makeup. I used it over my foundation and it didn’t sumdge my foundation it looks so define and blend well. Definitely will continue using it. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved the bronze balm! It is so easy to apply, I like that it's light weight and it doesn't feel heavy on my skin. You can use it on you’r eyes, cheek’s and lips. I recived something exchange for this post.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This new skin bronze balm is absolutely beautiful and very unique. It is a skincare and makeup item in one, also has very pleasant texture. I love to use it on my skin to highlight the complexion. It is very rich and smoothing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: SIMIHAZE's Melting Bronze Balm is pure magic in a jar! Its luxurious texture glides on smoothly, leaving my skin with a gorgeous bronzed glow. The subtle shimmer adds a touch of radiance, making me feel like a sun-kissed goddess. A must-have for that effortless summer glow! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This melting bronzer balm has been so much fun to use I typically have a really hard time with powder bronzer blending it in, so this makes it so much easier and actually looks nice. It matches my complexion, well, and blends/melts so easy. I have used it for contouring and as an eyeshadow. I’ll admit I haven’t used it on my lips and I don’t think I will lol  I absolutely love the packaging on this the twist casing and that they can be stacked together it’s cute and creative.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was Gifted this product by Simihaze and I am so in love with this bronze balm! It was so easy to blend on the skin, it bronzed my face up really well and last all day long. Definitely will be purchasing again!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly, love the packaging design. So sleek and cool how you can connect it to their other products. The bronzer feels creamy when applied, then turns into a matte powder. Really easy to work with and blend using my finger. The shade Sycamore is perfect for my fair skin. Gives a nice sun kissed look and creates a lovely neutral eye look as an eyeshadow!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really do love the concept of this bronzer so I was so excited when I got the chance to try it out for myself! The packaging is very cool and sleek. The bronzer itself blended beautifully and added a great color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m very happy with this bronzer! I used this on my sister who is more of a natural beat person and it was great. Blends easily and seamlessly. You can use a little for a subtle bronze or pick up more for a full glam. Overall I like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this bronzing balm. I love how smooth and effortlessly it applied onto my face. after using I looked very tan and smooth and it smoothed over my pores. I also love the packaging. will buy again

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This bronzer creates a monochromatic effect on eyes, lips and cheeks. It works great if you want to contour or sculpt your face. It is a bit drying though if you tend to have dryer skin. The color matched nicely with my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this starts as a really creamy bronzer and then dries down to a powder! It blends easily and I even put it on my eyes, lips, and cheeks to make a monochromatic look and it this product worked great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect color and super blendable. Looks natural on my skin and doesn’t cake or fade throughout the day. Lasts All day, subtle and easy to use. I definitely recommend. I received in exchange for this post.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my first time trying this brand and it didn’t disappoint, the color is perfect for contouring and sculpting. it DOES NOT give you a muddy look just a natural shadow. this is a new type of formula a cream to powder which is so unique the packaging is stackable and super minimalist which it’s good for storing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really velvety and smooth formula! It blends very easily and doesn't look streaky at all. I love how it melts into my skin and looks so natural. You can also add more to deepen the effect. I'm obsessed with this!

reviews.review_title: Easy to blend with a beautiful natural finish!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this vegan and cruelty free formula so much! It’s easy to blend and very pigmented. It creates a gorgeous natural finish and it’s very lightweight on the skin. I also love the packaging it’s very unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift from Simihaze Beauty. This is my first time using anything from this brand and I was pleasantly surprised. Initially, I didn’t believe it was a Cream because it does look like a powder in the packaging. But upon touching it, it’s definitely creamy and very pigmented. A little bit goes a long way, and it definitely doesn’t melt into the skin seamlessly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked the packing a lot of the gifted by skin suede bronzer! It’s also very compact which makes it easy for travel! Nice to blend out as well and I will occasionally use it for eyeshadow or a smoky eye

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this multipurpose balm. So easy to blend and love the texture-gel like but dries down to matte. Packaging is so chic looks like an Oreo! I’ve been using it on my eyes and cheeks looks so natural. I got it in a darker shade to contour and it’s amazing ‘

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a natural bronzed look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm gives the skin a really natural luminous bronzed look. The texture is very creamy and glides on smooth and blends very easily into the skin. It’s very long lasting. Also great to use as an eyeshadow. I would definitely recommend this for more dry skin types because it is very balmy.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Oak 03 - medium with warm peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I can’t get over how smooth and natural this looks.  The formula is like a gel and it blends out so easily without messing up my makeup underneath or getting muddy and I found that it lasted all day on me.  I also really liked it on my eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Its multi-purpose cream-to-powder formula is a delight to work with, seamlessly blending into the skin for a flawless finish. The Melting Bronze Balm's shade Maple is the perfect choice for sculpting and adding warmth to your complexion. It's incredibly buildable, allowing you to achieve both natural and more intense contouring effects. Its so versatile you can use it to contour your cheekbones, nose, or even as an eyeshadow. It is a must-have in your makeup collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so different from any other bronzing products I’ve tried! First of all it goes on creamy but dries completely matte! The shade option I got worked amazing for my skin tone. It gives off a monochromatic look that you can use on your face or eyes! I love it!!

I received this product complimentary and free from Sephora. I love the stackable skin suede melting bronzing balm. This product does such a great job at giving me that bronzy look during my makeup routine. I will be using this everyday!

reviews.review_title: Love everything about it, packaging to formula!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color was amazing, I am fair and have an peach-yellow undertone and this was not too orange or too gray. It looks very natural and in terms of formula, it’s like the Rare Beauty capsule blushes that feels creamy but sets down once it’s applied. Would not recommend using a sponge or fingers to apply, 100% use a brush - I use an angled blush brush and it works perfectly fine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that the packaging is very sleek and cute. The bronzer itself melted into my skin very nicely. The bronzer dryed down to a very nice sort of matte but did not look dry. I feel like it blended out nice with my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how versatile this product is! While it is labeled as a bronzing balm, it’s not limited to just the cheeks, you can also use it as an eyeshadow! I love the pigmentation of this balm, it blended so well into my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hoping to really like this STACKABLES SKIN SUEDE Melting Bronze Balm from Simihaze. The shade is excellent and I love the packaging but I found the formula to be a little bit patchy. I would be interested in trying more from this brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I knew i would love this product the minute i felt the consistency on my fingers. It definitely allows for multi-purpose use, as i have tried it as lip liner, eyeshadow and contour. This product is perfect for natural or  “no-makeup” looks because it melts and blends perfectly into the skin, while providing a lot hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These melting bronze balms are amazing! They blend so easily and the packaging is so sleek and compact that it’s perfect to take on the go. The formula is nice and creamy and blends to perfection without disrupting my foundation. Definitely recommend to anyone looking for a new cream bronzer! Can’t wait to continue using this for the rest of the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got my hands on the SKIN SUEDE Melting Bronze Balm and I’m blown away! From its innovative engineering system offering portability and daily customization, to its ability to even out and perfect my complexion, it’s become a daily staple in my routine.  Not only does it provide an impeccable finish, but my skin feels enriched with moisture throughout the day. As Simi & Haze stated, it’s a game-changer for those who want an alternative to contouring. It gives that sun-kissed, radiant look that’s subtle yet transformative.  I’ve also been experimenting with it as a monochromatic touch on my eyes and lips, and the results are fabulous. The mattifying powders give it a silky finish, and I love the sensation of the balm melting onto my skin. But what truly stands out for me is the Hydra-Sphere Complex. My skin has never felt so plump and hydrated. And to top it all, it’s vegan, cruelty-free, paraben-free, and silicone-free.  Highly recommend this product to everyone looking for that perfect summer glow or just an everyday radiant look. Thanks, Sephora, for introducing me to this gem! 💕
